data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on the genus Gribodia Zavattari, 1912 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from Vietnam and China, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Lien Thi Phuong, Xu, Zaifu (2015): Taxonomic notes on the genus Gribodia Zavattari, 1912 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from Vietnam and China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4040 (4): 458-464, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.4.5
